member.name: T:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController
member.summary: RESTful endpoints to handle products resource

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Get
member.summary: Return the list of all Products, with the basic information about the products.

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Return all informations about the product with entered id.

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Post(ValorProfsApi.Data.Entities.Product)
member.summary: Insert the entered product in the DB

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Put(System.Int32,ValorProfsApi.Data.Entities.Product)
member.summary: Modify the product with the entered id, after the modification the product will equal to the entered value.

member.name: M:ValorProfsApi.Controllers.ProductsController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete the product with the entered id from the DB
